caption.p: Chemical structure of phytochemicals isolated from the leaves of Acacia sieberiana. Chrysoeriol-7- O-rutinoside ( 1), luteolin-7- O-rutinoside ( 2), chrysoeriol-7- O-β- D-glucopyranoside ( 3), apigenin-7- O-β- D-glucopyranoside ( 4), luteolin-3′,4′-dimethoxylether-7- O-β- D-glucoside ( 5), luteolin ( 6), sitosterol-3- O-β- D-glucoside ( 7).
